property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Aether Membrane blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +0/+1. Sacrifice Angelic Shield: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If only an angel's wings could shelter us all."—Barrin, master wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Molten earth has no anger of its own. Only by infusing it with your own rage can the magma seethe and take shape."—Koth of the Hammer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: Bloodfire Colossus deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took all its strength to contain the fire within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: Bloodfire Kavu deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What the current doesn't take, they do.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shapeshifter mimics with a twin's esteem and a mirror's cruelty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Coral Fighters attacks and isn't blocked, look at the top card of defending player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Cosi's Ravager deal 1 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cosi has many followers. Even the volcano finds a way to do his bidding."—Zakken, Enclave cleric

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Cryptic Annelid enters the battlefield, scry 1, then scry 2, then scry 3. (To scry X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value:
You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay Downhill Charge's mana cost.
Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Earth Servant gets +0/+1 for each Mountain you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire. Air. Water. These elements spread, filling in the spaces they are not. But earth is implacable like a sullen child."—Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability."—Maggath, Sardian elementalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flood Plain enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Flood Plain: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Galepowder Mage attacks, exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyser Glider gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air."—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Greater Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying. {2}{R}: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having charted their way up the difficult face, the two mountaineers had to contend with the mountain's decision to stand up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast Jaws of Stone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Jedit's Dragoons enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After Efrava was destroyed, the cat warriors scattered across Dominaria. Those who followed Jedit's example were strong enough to survive the ravages of apocalypse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the clouds, you can see as far as the distant horizon. It's a reminder of the infinite possibilities of everyday life."—Noboru, master kitemaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kor Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kor have no concept of exploration. They return to homelands forgotten.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1: Untap target Mountain. It becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. −2: Add {R} to your mana pool for each Mountain you control. −5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have ‘{T}: This land deals 1 damage to target creature or player.'"

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Lithophage unless you sacrifice a Mountain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's viciously territorial, destroying every creature on the mountain it has chosen to consume.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}, {T}: Target creature with power X or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Woven from threads of the spirit world, the mistcloak rendered its wearer invisible, but quickly fell to tatters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{W}{U}: Exile target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Olka collected the evening mist for years, studying its secrets. Once she learned its essence, she could vanish with a thought.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Neurok Invisimancer can't be blocked. When Neurok Invisimancer enters the battlefield, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They won't see your shadow or hear your breath, but they will feel your blade."

property.name: Rules
property.value: New Benalia enters the battlefield tapped. When New Benalia enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. You gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With one commanding word, the spell was put down and a fine collected for its casting.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Plated Geopede gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It prefers a cooked meal, so it will eat you now and lava-bask later.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Primal Plasma enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 creature, a 2/2 creature with flying, or a 1/6 creature with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tocasia brushed the gears and cogs from the table. There, before two wide-eyed brothers, she began a lesson on raw elemental magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Pygmy Pyrosaur can't block.
{R}: Pygmy Pyrosaur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Do not judge a lizard by its size.—Ghitu proverb

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No half measures, no regrets. We'll tell no stories of this day. It will be as if it never existed at all."—Ganedor, loxodon mystic

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With one flap of her wings, the angel beat back the fires of war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand. When Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I've learned how to disable wards, pick locks, and decode the Agaran language—all before even reading the scroll!

property.name: Rules
property.value: Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player and 1 damage to target creature that player controls. Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player and 3 damage to that creature instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you."—Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Arrows are only one way to remove an enemy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like a strain of music: easy to remember but impossible to catch."—Mirri of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Slith Strider becomes blocked, draw a card. Whenever Slith Strider deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A slith's form and function are determined by the color of the sun under which it's born.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield tapped. When Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spire Barrage deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblin lessons include the 2,071 tips for survival. Frek only remembered 2,070.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.) As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A typical day for a giant. A momentous event for a goat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There may exist powers even greater than Phyrexia.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Untap Torchling. {R}: Target creature blocks Torchling this turn if able. {R}: Change the target of target spell that targets only Torchling. {1}: Torchling gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}: Torchling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +2: Exile target permanent you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. −1: Creatures can't be blocked this turn. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Volley of Boulders deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Flashback {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +3/+3. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He experiences every emotion with passion and repays every slight with vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {T}: Vulshok Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vulshok sorcerers train by leaping into electrified storm clouds. Dead or alive, they come back down with smiles on their faces.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It provides what every discerning mage requires—time to think.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {W}: Windreaver gains vigilance until end of turn. {W}: Windreaver gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {U}: Switch Windreaver's power and toughness until end of turn. {U}: Return Windreaver to its owner's hand.
